page.title: 13SCHOOL DAY STROUD
page.content: {A School Day,Gastrells Primary,Stroud Here is how a class of nine and ten year old children spent a day in May 1985.The first child woke at 6 am. Nearly half ate cereal for breakfast, five ate a cooked meal, and two made do with fruit juice.Pre-school activities included watching television(13 children),reading, pet-care and piano practice.Just under half the children went to school by car. The Vicar visited for assembly, followed by a morning of Maths and Language.10 children ate school dinners,16 ate sandwiches.Afternoon Art involved etching.After school they went home for football,television, skating and pony riding.Tea ranged from milk and toast to ravioli.Three quarters attended Brownies or Cubs.All were in bed for 9.45.pm.
